44SurfaceSkdTree::SurfaceSkdTree(const SurfaceKernel *patch, bool interiorCellsOnly)
45 : PatchSkdTree(patch, interiorCellsOnly)
46{
47}
48
55void SurfaceSkdTree::clear(bool release)
56{
57 if (release) {
58 std::vector<std::size_t>().swap(m_nodeStack);
59 std::vector<std::size_t>().swap(m_candidateIds);
60 std::vector<double>().swap(m_candidateMinDistances);
61 }
62
63 PatchSkdTree::clear(release);
64}
65
75double SurfaceSkdTree::evalPointDistance(const std::array<double, 3> &point) const
76{
77 return evalPointDistance(point, std::numeric_limits<double>::max(), false);
78}
79
96double SurfaceSkdTree::evalPointDistance(const std::array<double, 3> &point, double maxDistance) const
97{
98 return evalPointDistance(point, maxDistance, false);
99}
100
120double SurfaceSkdTree::evalPointDistance(const std::array<double, 3> &point, double maxDistance, bool interiorCellsOnly) const
121{
122 long id;
123 double distance = maxDistance;
124
125 findPointClosestCell(point, interiorCellsOnly, &id, &distance);
126
127 return distance;
128}
129
140void SurfaceSkdTree::evalPointDistance(int nPoints, const std::array<double, 3> *points, double *distances) const
141{
142 std::vector<double> maxDistances(nPoints, std::numeric_limits<double>::max());
143
144 evalPointDistance(nPoints, points, maxDistances.data(), false, distances);
145}
146
164void SurfaceSkdTree::evalPointDistance(int nPoints, const std::array<double, 3> *points, double maxDistance, double *distances) const
165{
166 std::vector<double> maxDistances(nPoints, maxDistance);
167
168 evalPointDistance(nPoints, points, maxDistances.data(), false, distances);
169}
170
188void SurfaceSkdTree::evalPointDistance(int nPoints, const std::array<double, 3> *points, const double *maxDistances, double *distances) const
189{
190 evalPointDistance(nPoints, points, maxDistances, false, distances);
191}

213void SurfaceSkdTree::evalPointDistance(int nPoints, const std::array<double, 3> *points, const double *maxDistances, bool interiorCellsOnly, double *distances) const
214{
215 std::vector<long> ids(nPoints, Cell::NULL_ID);
216
217 findPointClosestCell(nPoints, points, maxDistances, interiorCellsOnly, ids.data(), distances);
218}

282void SurfaceSkdTree::evalPointGlobalDistance(int nPoints, const std::array<double, 3> *points, const double *maxDistances, double *distances) const
283{
284 std::vector<long> ids(nPoints, Cell::NULL_ID);
285 std::vector<int> ranks(nPoints, -1);
286
287 findPointClosestGlobalCell(nPoints, points, maxDistances, ids.data(), ranks.data(), distances);
288}

306long SurfaceSkdTree::findPointClosestCell(const std::array<double, 3> &point, long *id, double *distance) const
307{
308 return findPointClosestCell(point, std::numeric_limits<double>::max(), false, id, distance);
309}
310
328long SurfaceSkdTree::findPointClosestCell(const std::array<double, 3> &point, double maxDistance,
329 long *id, double *distance) const
330{
331 return findPointClosestCell(point, maxDistance, false, id, distance);
332}
333
353long SurfaceSkdTree::findPointClosestCell(const std::array<double, 3> &point, double maxDistance,
354 bool interiorCellsOnly, long *id, double *distance) const
355{
356 // Tolerance for distance evaluations
357 const PatchKernel &patch = getPatch();
358 double tolerance = patch.getTol();
359
360 // Initialize the cell id
361 *id = Cell::NULL_ID;
362
363 // Get the root of the tree
364 std::size_t rootId = 0;
365 const SkdNode &root = m_nodes[rootId];
366 if (root.isEmpty()) {
367 *distance = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
368
369 return 0;
370 }
371
372 // Initialize a distance estimate
373 //
374 // The real distance will be lesser than or equal to the estimate.
375 //
376 // Care must be taken to avoid overflow when performing the multiplication.
377 double squaredMaxDistance;
378 if (maxDistance <= 1. || maxDistance < std::numeric_limits<double>::max() / maxDistance) {
379 squaredMaxDistance = maxDistance * maxDistance;
380 } else {
381 squaredMaxDistance = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
382 }
383
384 double squareDistanceEstimate = std::min(root.evalPointMaxSquareDistance(point), squaredMaxDistance);
385
386 // Get a list of candidates nodes
387 //
388 // If threads safe lookups are not needed, some temporary data structures
389 // are declared as member of the class to avoid their reallocation every
390 // time the function is called.
391 //
392 // First, we gather all the candidates and then we evaluate the distance
393 // of each candidate. Since distance estimate is constantly updated when
394 // new nodes are processed, the final estimate may be smaller than the
395 // minimum distance of some candidates. Processing the candidates after
396 // scanning all the tree, allows to discard some of them without the need
397 // of evaluating the exact distance.
398 std::unique_ptr<std::vector<std::size_t>> privateNodeStack;
399 std::unique_ptr<std::vector<std::size_t>> privateCandidateIds;
400 std::unique_ptr<std::vector<double>> privateCandidateMinDistances;
401
402 std::vector<std::size_t> *nodeStack;
403 std::vector<std::size_t> *candidateIds;
404 std::vector<double> *candidateMinDistances;
405 if (areLookupsThreadSafe()) {
406 privateNodeStack = std::unique_ptr<std::vector<std::size_t>>(new std::vector<std::size_t>());
407 privateCandidateIds = std::unique_ptr<std::vector<std::size_t>>(new std::vector<std::size_t>());
408 privateCandidateMinDistances = std::unique_ptr<std::vector<double>>(new std::vector<double>());
409
410 nodeStack = privateNodeStack.get();
411 candidateIds = privateCandidateIds.get();
412 candidateMinDistances = privateCandidateMinDistances.get();
413 } else {
414 m_nodeStack.clear();
415 m_candidateIds.clear();
416 m_candidateMinDistances.clear();
417
418 nodeStack = &m_nodeStack;
419 candidateIds = &m_candidateIds;
420 candidateMinDistances = &m_candidateMinDistances;
421 }
422
423 nodeStack->push_back(rootId);
424 while (!nodeStack->empty()) {
425 std::size_t nodeId = nodeStack->back();
426 const SkdNode &node = m_nodes[nodeId];
427 nodeStack->pop_back();
428
429 // Do not consider nodes with a minimum distance greater than
430 // the distance estimate
431 double nodeMinSquareDistance = node.evalPointMinSquareDistance(point);
432 if (utils::DoubleFloatingGreater()(nodeMinSquareDistance, squareDistanceEstimate, tolerance, tolerance)) {
433 continue;
434 }
435
436 // Update the distance estimate
437 //
438 // The real distance will be less than or equal to the estimate.
439 double nodeMaxSquareDistance = node.evalPointMaxSquareDistance(point);
440 squareDistanceEstimate = std::min(nodeMaxSquareDistance, squareDistanceEstimate);
441
442 // If the node is a leaf add it to the candidates, otherwise add its
443 // children to the stack.
444 bool isLeaf = true;
445 for (int i = SkdNode::CHILD_BEGIN; i != SkdNode::CHILD_END; ++i) {
446 SkdNode::ChildLocation childLocation = static_cast<SkdNode::ChildLocation>(i);
447 std::size_t childId = node.getChildId(childLocation);
448 if (childId != SkdNode::NULL_ID) {
449 isLeaf = false;
450 nodeStack->push_back(childId);
451 }
452 }
453
454 if (isLeaf) {
455 candidateIds->push_back(nodeId);
456 candidateMinDistances->push_back(std::sqrt(nodeMinSquareDistance));
457 }
458 }
459
460 // Process the candidates and find the closest cell
461 if (!candidateIds->empty()) {
462 *distance = std::sqrt(squareDistanceEstimate);
463 } else {
464 *distance = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
465 }
466
467 long nDistanceEvaluations = 0;
468 for (std::size_t k = 0; k < candidateIds->size(); ++k) {
469 // Do not consider nodes with a minimum distance greater than the
470 // distance estimate
471 if (utils::DoubleFloatingGreater()(candidateMinDistances->at(k), *distance, tolerance, tolerance)) {
472 continue;
473 }
474
475 // Evaluate the distance
476 std::size_t nodeId = candidateIds->at(k);
477 const SkdNode &node = m_nodes[nodeId];
478
479 node.updatePointClosestCell(point, interiorCellsOnly, id, distance);
480 ++nDistanceEvaluations;
481 }
482
483 return nDistanceEvaluations;
484}
485
497long SurfaceSkdTree::findPointClosestCell(int nPoints, const std::array<double, 3> *points, long *ids, double *distances) const
498{
499 long nDistanceEvaluations = 0;
500 for (int i = 0; i < nPoints; ++i) {
501 nDistanceEvaluations += findPointClosestCell(points[i], std::numeric_limits<double>::max(), false, ids + i, distances + i);
502 }
503
504 return nDistanceEvaluations;
505}
506
523long SurfaceSkdTree::findPointClosestCell(int nPoints, const std::array<double, 3> *points, double maxDistance, long *ids, double *distances) const
524{
525 long nDistanceEvaluations = 0;
526 for (int i = 0; i < nPoints; ++i) {
527 nDistanceEvaluations += findPointClosestCell(points[i], maxDistance, false, ids + i, distances + i);
528 }
529
530 return nDistanceEvaluations;
531}
532
550long SurfaceSkdTree::findPointClosestCell(int nPoints, const std::array<double, 3> *points, const double *maxDistances, long *ids, double *distances) const
551{
552 return findPointClosestCell(nPoints, points, maxDistances, false, ids, distances);
553}

574long SurfaceSkdTree::findPointClosestCell(int nPoints, const std::array<double, 3> *points, const double *maxDistances, bool interiorCellsOnly, long *ids, double *distances) const
575{
576 long nDistanceEvaluations = 0;
577 for (int i = 0; i < nPoints; ++i) {
578 nDistanceEvaluations += findPointClosestCell(points[i], maxDistances[i], interiorCellsOnly, ids + i, distances + i);
579 }
580
581 return nDistanceEvaluations;
582}

584#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI

601{
602 return findPointClosestGlobalCell(nPoints, points, std::numeric_limits<double>::max(), ids, ranks, distances);

604
624long SurfaceSkdTree::findPointClosestGlobalCell(int nPoints, const std::array<double, 3> *points, double maxDistance,
625 long *ids, int *ranks, double *distances) const
626{
627 std::vector<double> maxDistances(nPoints, maxDistance);
628
629 return findPointClosestGlobalCell(nPoints, points, maxDistances.data(), ids, ranks, distances);
630}
631
652long SurfaceSkdTree::findPointClosestGlobalCell(int nPoints, const std::array<double, 3> *points, const double *maxDistances,
653 long *ids, int *ranks, double *distances) const
654{
655 long nDistanceEvaluations = 0;
656
657 // Early return is the patch is not partitioned
658 const PatchKernel &patch = getPatch();
659 if (!patch.isPartitioned()) {
660 for (int i = 0; i < nPoints; ++i) {
661 // Evaluate distance
662 nDistanceEvaluations += findPointClosestCell(points[i], maxDistances[i], ids + i, distances + i);
663
664 // The patch is not partitioned, all cells are local
665 ranks[i] = patch.getRank();
666 }
667
668 return nDistanceEvaluations;
669 }
670
671 // Get MPI communicator
672 if (!isCommunicatorSet()) {
673 throw std::runtime_error("Skd-tree communicator has not been set.");
674 }
675
676 MPI_Comm communicator = getCommunicator();
677
678 // Gather the number of points associated to each process
679 std::vector<int> pointsCount(m_nProcessors);
680 MPI_Allgather(&nPoints, 1, MPI_INT, pointsCount.data(), 1, MPI_INT, communicator);
681
682 // Evaluate information for data communications
683 std::vector<int> globalPointsDispls(m_nProcessors, 0);
684 std::vector<int> globalPointsOffsets(m_nProcessors, 0);
685 std::vector<int> globalPointsDataCount(m_nProcessors, 0);
686
687 globalPointsDataCount[0] = 3 * pointsCount[0];
688 for (int i = 1; i < m_nProcessors; ++i) {
689 globalPointsDispls[i] = globalPointsDispls[i - 1] + 3 * pointsCount[i - 1];
690 globalPointsOffsets[i] = globalPointsOffsets[i - 1] + pointsCount[i - 1];
691 globalPointsDataCount[i] = 3 * pointsCount[i];
692 }
693
694 int nGlobalPoints = globalPointsDispls.back() + pointsCount.back();
695
696 // Gather point coordinates
697 std::vector<std::array<double,3>> globalPoints(nGlobalPoints);
698 int pointsDataCount = 3 * nPoints;
699 MPI_Allgatherv(points, pointsDataCount, MPI_DOUBLE, globalPoints.data(),
700 globalPointsDataCount.data(), globalPointsDispls.data(), MPI_DOUBLE, communicator);
701
702 // Gather vector with all maximum distances
703 std::vector<double> globalMaxDistances(nGlobalPoints);
704 MPI_Allgatherv(maxDistances, nPoints, MPI_DOUBLE, globalMaxDistances.data(),
705 pointsCount.data(), globalPointsOffsets.data(), MPI_DOUBLE, communicator);
706
707 // Initialize distance information
708 std::vector<SkdGlobalCellDistance> globalCellDistances(nGlobalPoints);
709
710 // Call local find point closest cell for each global point collected
711 for (int i = 0; i < nGlobalPoints; ++i) {
712 // Get point information
713 const std::array<double, 3> &point = globalPoints[i];
714
715 // Use a maximum distance for each point given by an estimation
716 // based on partition bounding boxes. The distance will be lesser
717 // than or equal to the point maximum distance.
718 double pointMaxDistance = globalMaxDistances[i];
719 for (int rank = 0; rank < m_nProcessors; ++rank) {
720 pointMaxDistance = std::min(getPartitionBox(rank).evalPointMaxDistance(point, std::numeric_limits<double>::max()), pointMaxDistance);
721 }
722
723 // Get cell distance information
724 SkdGlobalCellDistance &globalCellDistance = globalCellDistances[i];
725 int &cellRank = globalCellDistance.getRank();
726 long &cellId = globalCellDistance.getId();
727 double &cellDistance = globalCellDistance.getDistance();
728
729 // Evaluate local distance from the point
730 bool interiorCellsOnly = true;
731 nDistanceEvaluations += findPointClosestCell(point, pointMaxDistance, interiorCellsOnly, &cellId, &cellDistance);
732
733 // Set cell rank
734 if (cellId != Cell::NULL_ID) {
735 cellRank = patch.getCellOwner(cellId);
736 }
737 }
738
739 // Exchange distance information
740 MPI_Datatype globalCellDistanceDatatype = SkdGlobalCellDistance::getMPIDatatype();
741 MPI_Op globalCellDistanceMinOp = SkdGlobalCellDistance::getMPIMinOperation();
742 for (int rank = 0; rank < m_nProcessors; ++rank) {
743 SkdGlobalCellDistance *globalCellDistance = globalCellDistances.data() + globalPointsOffsets[rank];
744 if (m_rank == rank) {
745 MPI_Reduce(MPI_IN_PLACE, globalCellDistance, pointsCount[rank], globalCellDistanceDatatype, globalCellDistanceMinOp, rank, communicator);
746 } else {
747 MPI_Reduce(globalCellDistance, globalCellDistance, pointsCount[rank], globalCellDistanceDatatype, globalCellDistanceMinOp, rank, communicator);
748 }
749 }
750
751 // Update output arguments
752 for (int i = 0; i < nPoints; ++i) {
753 int globalIndex = i + globalPointsOffsets[m_rank];
754 SkdGlobalCellDistance &globalCellDistance = globalCellDistances[globalIndex];
755 globalCellDistance.exportData(ranks + i, ids + i, distances + i);
756 }
757
758 return nDistanceEvaluations;
759}
760#endif
761
